languages.text: "Безумие и фанатизм, беспринципность и паранойя пожрали нас. Прежняя ошибка более не будет повторена. Я, Паскаль Ханейманн, принимаю всю власть и все бремя ответственности на свои плечи. Я единолично сохраню великое знание Эсхатоса и определю судьбу Цикла, что будет прерван".

"We were consumed by madness and fanaticism, by depravity and paranoia. The old mistake will not be repeated. I, Pasqal Haneumann, will take the entirety of the power and shoulder the entirety of the burden. I alone will preserve the great knowledge of Eschatos and decide the fate of the Cycle that will be discontinued."
languages.original_text: "Безумие и фанатизм, беспринципность и паранойя пожрали нас. Прежняя ошибка более не будет повторена. Я, Паскаль Ханейманн, принимаю всю власть и все бремя ответственности на свои плечи. Я единолично сохраню великое знание Эсхатоса и определю судьбу Цикла, что будет прерван".

traits.locale_text: "We were consumed by madness and fanaticism, by unscrupulousness and paranoia. The old mistake will not be repeated. I, Pasqal Haneumann, will take the entirety of the power and shoulder the entirety of the burden. I alone will preserve the great knowledge of Eschatos and decide the fate of the Cycle which is to be discontinued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「我々は狂気と狂信にとりつかれ、堕落と妄執に陥った。過去の過ちは繰り返さない。自分、パスカル・ヘニュマンは、すべての力を得て、すべての重責を担う。自分だけがエスカトの大いなる知識を保護し、断ち切られる運命にあるサイクルの結末を決める」
languages.original_text: "We were consumed by madness and fanaticism, by depravity and paranoia. The old mistake will not be repeated. I, Pasqal Haneumann, will take the entirety of the power and shoulder the entirety of the burden. I alone will preserve the great knowledge of Eschatos and decide the fate of the Cycle that will be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は狂気と狂信にとりつかれ、堕落と妄執に陥った。過去の過ちは繰り返さない。自分、パスカル・ヘニュマンは、すべての力を得て、すべての重責を担う。自分だけがエスカトの大いなる知識を保護し、断ち切られる運命にあるサイクルの結末を決める」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我们曾被疯狂和盲信、堕落与偏执所蚕食。过去的错误不会重演。我，帕斯卡·哈努曼，将承担所有的权力和责任。我将独自保存终焉审判的伟大知识，并决定终止循环。”
languages.original_text: "We were consumed by madness and fanaticism, by depravity and paranoia. The old mistake will not be repeated. I, Pasqal Haneumann, will take the entirety of the power and shoulder the entirety of the burden. I alone will preserve the great knowledge of Eschatos and decide the fate of the Cycle that will be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: “我们曾被疯狂和盲信、堕落与偏执所蚕食。过去的错误不会重演。我，帕斯卡·哈努曼，将承担所有的权力和责任。我将独自保存终焉审判的伟大知识，并决定终止循环。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Nous étions dévorés par la folie et le fanatisme, par la dépravation et la paranoïa. Nous ne répéterons pas cette erreur. Moi, Pasqal Haneumann, assumerai seul le fardeau de ce pouvoir. Moi seul préserverai la connaissance d'Eschatos et déciderai du destin du Cycle qui doit être interrompu. »
languages.original_text: "We were consumed by madness and fanaticism, by depravity and paranoia. The old mistake will not be repeated. I, Pasqal Haneumann, will take the entirety of the power and shoulder the entirety of the burden. I alone will preserve the great knowledge of Eschatos and decide the fate of the Cycle that will be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: « Nous étions dévorés par la folie et le fanatisme, par la dépravation et la paranoïa. Nous ne répéterons pas cette erreur. Moi, Pasqal Haneumann, assumerai seul le fardeau de ce pouvoir. Moi seul préserverai la connaissance d'Eschatos et déciderai du destin du Cycle qui doit être interrompu. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Nos consumió la locura y el fanatismo, la depravación y la paranoia. No cometeremos el mismo error. Yo, Pasqal Haneumann, aunaré todo el poder y llevaré esta pesada carga. Solo yo preservaré el conocimiento de Eschatos y decidiré el destino del Ciclo que debe interrumpirse».
languages.original_text: "We were consumed by madness and fanaticism, by depravity and paranoia. The old mistake will not be repeated. I, Pasqal Haneumann, will take the entirety of the power and shoulder the entirety of the burden. I alone will preserve the great knowledge of Eschatos and decide the fate of the Cycle that will be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: «Nos consumió la locura y el fanatismo, la depravación y la paranoia. No cometeremos el mismo error. Yo, Pasqal Haneumann, aunaré todo el poder y llevaré esta pesada carga. Solo yo preservaré el conocimiento de Eschatos y decidiré el destino del Ciclo que debe interrumpirse».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Wir wurden von Wahnsinn und Fanatismus verzehrt, von Verkommenheit und Paranoia. Der alte Fehler wird nicht wiederholt werden. Ich, Pasqal Haneumann, werde die Gesamtheit der Macht übernehmen und die Gesamtheit der Last schultern. Ich allein werde das große Wissen um Eschatos bewahren und über das Schicksal des Zyklus entscheiden, der unterbrochen werden soll."
languages.original_text: "We were consumed by madness and fanaticism, by depravity and paranoia. The old mistake will not be repeated. I, Pasqal Haneumann, will take the entirety of the power and shoulder the entirety of the burden. I alone will preserve the great knowledge of Eschatos and decide the fate of the Cycle that will be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: "Wir wurden von Wahnsinn und Fanatismus verzehrt, von Verkommenheit und Paranoia. Der alte Fehler wird nicht wiederholt werden. Ich, Pasqal Haneumann, werde die Gesamtheit der Macht übernehmen und die Gesamtheit der Last schultern. Ich allein werde das große Wissen um Eschatos bewahren und über das Schicksal des Zyklus entscheiden, der unterbrochen werden soll."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Delilik ve fanatiklik tarafından, ahlaksızlık ve paranoya tarafından tüketildik. Eski hata tekrar edilmeyecek. Ben ki Pasqal Haneumann; gücün tamamını elime alacak, yükün tamamını omuzlayacağım. Eskatos'un ulu irfanını kendi başıma koruyacak, süreği bozulacak Döngü'nün kaderini kendi başıma belirleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "We were consumed by madness and fanaticism, by depravity and paranoia. The old mistake will not be repeated. I, Pasqal Haneumann, will take the entirety of the power and shoulder the entirety of the burden. I alone will preserve the great knowledge of Eschatos and decide the fate of the Cycle that will be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: "Delilik ve fanatiklik tarafından, ahlaksızlık ve paranoya tarafından tüketildik. Eski hata tekrar edilmeyecek. Ben, Pasqal Haneumann, gücün tamamını elime alacağım ve yükün tamamını omuzlayacağım. Eschatos'un ulu irfanını kendi başıma koruyacak, süreği bozulacak Döngü'nün kaderini kendi başıma belirleyeceğim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
